name: Mine Royale - Battle Royale
description:
The Battle Royale You All Have Been Waiting For!
Mine royale - Battleroyale is a mini battle royale game where you compete against players.

Your task is to choose one character and start playing.Features
  • Guns
  • Items
  • Gameplay
  • Battle Royale
  • Cross Platfom
  • Sandbox
  • Team Deathmatch
